titleStmt.title: Rich. Baxter's admonition to Mr. William Eyre of Salisbury; concerning his miscarriages in a book lately written for the justification of infidels, against M. Benj. Woodbridge, M. James Cranford and the author.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Thomas Underhill, at the Anchor and Bible ... and Francis Tyton, at the three Daggers ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
